long_description: The high-quality Arc'teryx Incendo Jacket for men is a stowable, minimalist, wind- and water-resistant jacket meant for cool, windy weather workouts in light precipitation. Outer fabric is incredibly lightweight, wicks moisture, dries quickly and incorporates just a bit stretch for ease of movement. Durable water repellent finish sheds light moisture and splashes. Large, open mesh underarm panels to keep body heat under control. Zippered security pocket works with a media player and features a cord passage. Stows inside its own pocket on hip. Arc'teryx Incendo Jacket for men features reflective highlights to increase your visibility in low light.
short_description: The high-quality Arc'teryx Incendo Jacket for men is a stowable, minimalist, wind- and water-resistant jacket meant for cool, windy weather workouts in light precipitation.
